## Bio
I am a raising Senior pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Statistcis & Data Science at UCLA. 

As a Statistcis & Data Science major, I am passionate about working with data and programming. I love data science and machine learning. I code in Java, C++, C#, Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, HTML & CSS. I usually use R, SQL, Tableau, and MATLAB to manipulate and analyze data. My favoriate programming language is Java.

I also love traveling, snorkeling, rock climbing, and volunteering at animal shelters.
